text:
本店所有图片都是专业摄影棚实物拍摄，后期不经图片处理软件处理直接截取图片大小上架。
部分宝贝为了突出细节，图片视觉显得比实物大，请大家详读产品属性。
由于灯光和显示器的影响，部分珍珠会有轻微的色差，对颜色要求高的朋友情先联系掌柜。
关于快递
本店默认圆通快递，如需寄顺丰快递麻烦亲联系我们。
本店承诺48小时内发货，如遇缺货我们会及时与您联系。
关于售后
我们保证商品质量，发货前我们会仔细检查。
trans:
All the pictures in this store are taken in a professional studio. They are not processed by image processing software, only resized and uploaded.
In order to highlight the details of some products, the pictures appear larger than the actual objects. Please read the product attributes carefully.
Under the influence of various lighting and monitors, some pearls will have slight color differences. If you hope to get the precise color, please contact the shopkeeper first.
About express delivery
Our store defaults to YTO Express. If you prefer SF Express, please contact us.
Our store promises to ship within 48 hours. If there is a shortage of goods, we will contact you in time.
About after-sales
We guarantee the quality of the goods and we will check them carefully before delivery.
